physical_appearance: "The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a large steamship on a body of water. Smoke is being emitted from its funnel. The superstructure that projects above the steamship's main deck has about three levels. It has two masts, one at the stern and bow. Below the image of the steamship, ""R.M.S. ""Andes"" 26
title_text: R.M.S. (Royal Mail Ship) Andes Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_1: 000 Tons Gross"" is stated at the bottom of the photograph.  "
